required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Osimertinib as 1st Line Therapy for Patients With Advanced EGFR Positive Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Osimertinib as First Line Therapy for Patients With Advanced EGFR Positive Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer: the Experience of the Hellenic Cooperative Oncology Group (HeCOG)

brief_summary.textblock: The present study will evaluate the use of osimertinib as 1st line therapy for patients with advanced EGFR positive non-small cell lung cancer who are treated at Hellenic Cooperative Oncology Group (HeCOG)-affiliated departments of oncology.

detailed_description.textblock: This will be an observational, multicentric, retrospective/ prospective analysis of patients with advanced EGFR positive non-small cell lung cancer that receive osimertinib as 1st line therapy. The patient data will be collected at Hellenic Cooperative Oncology Group (HeCOG)-affiliated departments of oncology during scheduled patient clinical visits, from February 2020 for a total period of three years. The biological material obtained from the patients of this analysis will be possibly used in a future translational study as an exploratory analysis.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
primary_outcome.description: the time from treatment initiation to either the first documented disease progression or death from any cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: the time from treatment initiation to patient death or last contact

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: the response rate for all enrolled population and for the response evaluable population

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: quality of life data through EQ-5D questionnaire

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Rates of adverse events because of treatment with osimertinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: description of health costs to determine cost-effectiveness of osimertinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through the completion of the study, up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: time from treatment initiation to objective tumour progression on next-line treatment or death from any cause

clinical_study.condition: Lung Cancer Non-small Cell Stage IV

arm_group.arm_group_label: untreated patients with advanced EGFR positive non-small cell lung cancer

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood samples will be collected from patients with advanced egfr positive non-small cell lung cancer

study_pop.textblock: patients with advanced EGFR positive non-small cell lung cancer that receive osimertinib as 1st line therapy and are treated at Hellenic Cooperative Oncology Group (HeCOG)-affiliated departments of oncology

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- men or women of 18 years or older that live in Greece
- histologically or cytologically confirmed, advanced EGFR positive non-small cell lung cancer
- untreated patients for advanced NSCLC
- patients who are expected to receive osimertinib regardless of their enrollment in the study
- signed written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with cancer other than NSCLC that require treatment
- pretreated patients for NSCLC
- patients that receive or are expected to receive or have received an investigational drug/product/intervention
